DStv Volume Saver

DStv Volume Saver is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your streaming experience on DStv Stream. This extension allows you to save your preferred volume level and manages volume settings on the platform, giving you complete control over how your volume preferences are handled.

Key Features:

- Save Your Preferred Volume: Set your desired volume level using the intuitive slider or direct input in the extension's popup.
- Flexible Volume Control: Choose between automatic or manual volume saving with the new toggle feature.
- Auto-Save Mode: Let the extension automatically save and apply volume changes as you adjust them in the video player.
- Manual Mode: Take full control and only save volume changes when you choose to do so.
- Automatic Volume Restoration: The extension remembers your saved volume and applies it automatically to all videos on DStv Stream.
- Real-Time Updates: Adjust the volume in real-time and see the changes instantly on your video player.
- Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly in the background without interrupting your streaming experience.

Whether you're watching your favorite shows or catching up on live sports, DStv Volume Saver ensures your audio settings are always just the way you like them. Perfect for users who want a consistent and customizable streaming experience!
